programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Jared Flitcroft is a filmmaker, businessman, family man, and he is Deaf. Overcoming barriers to achieve success in the film industry, Jared hopes for a future with NZSL used more widely.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Attitude
programme.desc:
Eighteen year old OJ lost his sister to Cystic Fibrosis ; a genetic lung condition he has also inherited. Every breath is a challenge for OJ, but with whanau support he's making each one count.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc:
Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.
Année : 2011

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP15) The assassination of U.S. President McKinley in Buffalo prompts a roundup of Canada's anarchists, landing Murdoch in the middle of a web of international espionage and intrigue. Guest stars: Peter Keleghan, Matthew Bennett and Lisa Norton.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (Detective William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace) Peter Keleghan (Terrence Meyers) Matthew Bennett (Allen Clegg) Lisa Norton (Emma Goodman)

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP35) On this episode of Double Tap TV, we are joined by Dawn Pickering, who describes her experiences raising a child who is blind. We discuss the challenges, lessons learned and support available for parents.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP02) In this episode of Disrupt, hosted by Taylor Olson, we introduce you to drag artists, an artist who is Deaf, a poet and a musician.
Année : 2023

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S02EP08) Elizabeth and Jack team up to prevent Julie and Tom from making a misstep. Gowen's latest unscrupulous plot involves Abigail's eatery.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary "Rosie" LeVeaux) Kavan Smith (Leland "Lee" Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Chelah Horsdal (Cat Montgomery) Mitchell Kummen (Gabe Montgomery) Gracyn Shinyei (Emily Montgomery) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: What Happened to Holly Bartlett
programme.desc:
In March 2010, 31-year-old blind graduate student Holly Bartlett was found beneath Halifax's MacKay Bridge. Police ruled her death a day later an accident. Eight years later, a private investigator reopens the case.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S03EP12) Christine and Carl get a little cheesy as Frankie 'Flowers' Ferragine returns to the Four Senses kitchen.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP04) We visit the Kamloops Waterski club and their adaptive clinic, where everyone has the opportunity to tip their toes in the water and try water skiing. Get on the water and take the disability out of the sport.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP13) Alex and Chris build some cigar box guitars ; then, with the help of Chris' stepson, construct a beer mug display shelf.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP01) Murdoch investigates after a prototype airplane crashes and kills an innocent bystander and is soon drawn into an arms race between the Canadian and American governments.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree)

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc:
We take to the ice with Kelly Serbu, captain of the Canadian National Blind Hockey team, to learn what makes him tick at the rink and in the courtroom. Plus, Greg Westlake learns about ParaSport TV live stream.
Année : 2008

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc:
(S04EP08) In this episode: Community counts. An active senior citizen starts to doubt his capabilities and worth when his vision slips.
Année : 2008

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S02EP09) Jack and Elizabeth experience a life-threatening ordeal, which makes them realize what's been keeping them apart. Later, a surprising arrest is made and a proposal takes place.
Année : 2014

programme.desc:

programme.desc:

Année : 2014

programme.title: Kim's Convenience
programme.desc:

Année : 2014
